DOC.criteria: All subject must : 1 . Be willing able provide write Informed Consent . 2 . Be able willing follow instruction likely complete entire course study . 3 . Be male female race least 18 year age . 4 . Have visually significant cataract elect undergo cataract surgery.. No subject may : 1 . Have contraindication use prostaglandin analog prostamide derivative . 3 . Have active ocular disease glaucoma ocular hypertension would interfere study parameter ( : uveitis , ocular infection , severe dry eye ) . Patients mild chronic blepharitis , agerelated macular degeneration , background diabetic retinopathy may enrol discretion investigator . 4 . Have laser intraocular surgery within past three month . 5 . Require use ocular medication ( include glaucoma medication ) , except intermittent use artificial tear . Patients may history ever use prostaglandin analog topically . 6 . Have know allergy sensitivity study medication component 7 . Have corneal abnormality would interfere ability obtain adequate sample safely shallow anterior would make obtain aqueous sample difficult time surgery opinion investigator . 8 . Be concurrently enrol investigational drug device study participation within last 30 day investigational drug device study . 9 . Be pregnant , nursing , plan pregnancy , childbearing potential use reliable form contraception ( woman consider childbearing potential unless postmenopausal , uterus and/or ovary remove , bilateral tubal ligation ) . 10 . Have situation condition investigator 's opinion may put subject significant risk , may confound study result , may interfere significantly participation study .
